job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in computer or information sciences or similar field preferred

jd: From: Shivamanish, Talentgroups shivamanish.b@talentgroups.com Reply to: shivamanish.b@talentgroups.com This is Shiva Manish I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our premier clients. Since it is an urgent business requirement your prompt response is appreciated.Job Title: SQL Data base AdministratorLocation: Chicago, Illinois or Atlanta, Georgia / Day 1 onsite Responsibilities • You are good at managing and operating Microsoft SQL Server database instances; optimizingconfiguration settings, performing database backups & restores, developing and running optimization tasks, composing automation scripts for repetitive tasks, etc.• You have experience with the most recent releases of SQL Server including the related products of Integration Services, Reporting Services, and Analysis Services. You have excellent communication skills, work well in a team, and are dedicated to providing outstanding customer service.• Able to work independently with minimal supervision• Individually execute and deliver on day-to-day activities• Perform research of viable technical and/or non-technical solutions• Share knowledge with the Team• Leverage internal networks in role and viewed by stakeholders as skilled specialist. Qualifications we seek in youMinimum Qualifications / Skills • Bachelor's degree in computer or information sciences or similar field preferred• You bring to us experience in managing SQL Server databases, T-SQL programming, knowledge of thirdform normalization design principals and indexing best practices. We would welcome experience inOracle and/or other DBMSs to help support RtB Preferred Qualifications/ Skills • Solid MS SQL Server DBA experience (SQL 2012-2019• Strong Database Design skills• Expertise in SQL Statement Tuning• Experience with native transactional Data Replication• Experience in configuring Always-On Availability Groups (incl. Windows Clustering)• Experience with deploying and managing Cloud Database Services (AWS/Azure preferred) like AWS DynamoDB, AWS RDS, Azure SQL, Azure Cosmos DB• Experience with Cloud automation deployment (e.g., Terraform for SQL RDS)• Good understanding of networking concepts in cloud (VPCs, Subnets, Security Groups, etc)• Strong T-SQL Programming capabilities• PowerShell and/ or Python scripting capabilities• Familiarity with Oracle Database technology (versions 11g, 12c, 18c, and 19c) a plus• Familiarity with Datadog as a monitoring and analytics tool• Familiarity with MySQL and PostgreSQL a plus• Maintain database security• Maintain Server and DB Auditing• Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving abilities
